space.arim.universal.events.helper

Class AutoFiringEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • space.arim.universal.events.helper.AbstractEvent
      • space.arim.universal.events.helper.AutoFiringEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Event

    public abstract class AutoFiringEvent
extends AbstractEvent
    A helper class for implementing Event which automatically fires itself when instantiated.
    Using this class ensures the specifications are always complied with.
    Author:
    A248

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected AutoFiringEvent(Events events)
      Creates the event with a corresponding Events instance.
      protected AutoFiringEvent(Events events, Runnable postFire)
      Creates the event with a corresponding Events instance.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class space.arim.universal.events.helper.AbstractEvent

        fire, isAsynchronous

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • AutoFiringEvent

        protected AutoFiringEvent(Events events)
        Creates the event with a corresponding Events instance.
        The event is immediately fired after instantiation.
        Parameters:
        events - the events instance

      • AutoFiringEvent

        protected AutoFiringEvent(Events events,
                          Runnable postFire)
        Creates the event with a corresponding Events instance.
        The event is immediately fired after instantiation. After the event is fired, if the Runnable provided is nonnull, it is run.
        Parameters:
        events - the events instance
        postFire - a runnable to execute after the event is fired
